sources.title: Captain Kronos Vampire Hunter
sources.description: A master swordsman and former soldier and his hunchbacked assistant hunt vampires.

sources.title: Captain Kronos Vampire Hunter 1974
sources.description: An ex soldier turned master swordsman and his hunchback assistant must solve a macabre mystery surrounding a village where vampires drain all women of their vitality leaving them decrepit and frail.

metadata.Plot: Vampire hunter and expert swordsman Kronos finds himself in a small village where several of the local young women have been found in an advanced state of age, their youth drained from them by a vampire's kiss. Kronos' search leads him to the Durward estate where he is met by the effete children of the apparently aged and sick Lady Durward.
metadata.Actors: Horst Janson, John Carson, Shane Briant
